page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content: Our D Block is situated in South Warwickshire. The landscape is undulating with the River Avon flowing through part of it. The area is mainly farm and market garden land. There are small centres of population in the villages of Welford-On-Avon, Weston-On-Avon & Dorsington. People travel to Warwick to work for the computer firm I.B.M, to Stratford- upon-Avon to work in the tourist industry & to Birmingham to work in the city, others work locally on the land. Housing is very mixed ranging from the very grand costing over Â£100 000 to a semi detached costing Â£30 000. The fourth & third year Juniors at Welford-On-Avon School have undertaken this survey.
